name: Hello Caroline
description:
This is an educational story narrative 2D RPG game where the player plays as Caroline, A 6-year-old girl embarking on her first day of kindergarten. This is a moral-themed game targeted at preschoolers, but it can also be enjoyed by older audiences.

This is the game I made for my FYP for uni, was given the moral-themed title for preschoolers and I can't change it. I work with what I got, and had fun with this game development. 

Oh yeah, self-promo time. Give me a follow, you're not inclined to, I would just appreciate it. https://www.instagram.com/farasapt/
